items.name: Barleypop
items.desc:
Barleypop / Lite Lager / 4 x 440ml / 4.4% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
POP-POP! Barleypop is our new 4.4% Lite Lager. Putting some polish on the well-worn everyday light lager, this is an extremely sunny beer designed for drinking with grass between your toes.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Blankets
items.desc:
Blankets / Pale Ale / 4 x 440ml / 4.2% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Blankets is the newest soft and fluffy creation from the Pale Ale department. Citra, Columbus and Cascade in sheer suppable balance. Pure, silky comfort.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Breakdown
items.desc:
Breakdown / DDH NEIPA / 4 x 440ml / 6.2% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Showcasing Citra alongside some Aussie pals Topaz and Enigma, Flashpoint is a full-bodied New England IPA with a hop character far in excess of its 6.2% ABV. Peach and pineapple notes are balanced by snappy dankness.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Desert Pary
items.desc:
Desert Pary / DDH Pale Ale / 4 x 440ml / 4.8% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Desert Pary might have supposed to be called Desert Party – it’s hard to say. Literally… is it pa-ry? paa-ry? pa-ree? Anyway we’re embracing it and powering through.
DESERT PARY is a delicious new DDH Pale Ale with the tingly citrus hop combo of Simcoe, Cascade and Amarillo. Got quite a bouncy mouthfeel, rolls around all juicy and piney then puts the brakes on for a pithy finish. Desert Pary. FFS.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Grisette
items.desc:
Grisette / Farmhouse Pale / 4 x 440ml / 4.4% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Grisette is our light, floral and citrusy Farmhouse Pale at 4.4% ABV. This is your ideal companion for working-in-the-sun (or just drinking-in-the-sun).
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: House IPA
items.desc:
House IPA / India Pale Ale / 4 x 440ml / 6.9% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
House IPA is a New England IPA with a light and fluffy body, delicate carbonation, and a big-hitting dry-hop combo of Mosaic and Motueka. Aromas of mango and pineapple. More tropical fruit on the tongue. Super drinkable and very moreish.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Lonely Town
items.desc:
Lonely Town / Session IPA / 4 x 440ml / 4.0% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Feeling like a lonely walker on a lonely street? Take solace in this new Session IPA. Centennial, Idaho 7 and Citra walk hand-in-hand in this resinous, tropical treat.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: New World Helles Lager
items.desc:
Bass Strait/ New World Helles Lager / 4 x 440ml / 4.7% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Bass Strait is a New World Helles Lager, where the addition of Motueka hops from New Zealand add a gentle, floral fruitiness to the classically bready Helles texture and crisp finish.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Passionfruit Gose
items.desc:
Passionfruit Gose / Fruit Sour / 4 x 440ml / 4.5% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Tangy, tropical, tart and tasty. A light and snappy Gose-style sour beer, infused with passionfruit.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Screwball
items.desc:
Screwball / Lemon and Lime Berliner Weisse / 4 x 440ml / 3.5% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
This tangy, tart lip-smacker is our latest fruited sour beer. Light in strength and sharp with snappy citrus, it’s an easy-drinking summer sour.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Secret Hotel
items.desc:
Secret Hotel / DDH Rye Pale Ale / 4 x 440ml / 5.5% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Secret Hotel is a DDH Rye Pale Ale hopped with Cryo Citra, Enigma and Sabro. Super-pale, hazy and complex, with notes of berries, pineapple and coconut from the hops mingling with a sweet note of spice from the rye malt.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Super Chuck
items.desc:
Super Chuck / SumMer Berry Kettle Sour / 4 x 440ml / 7.4% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Super Chuck is a 7.4% Summer Berry Kettle Sour using heavy-duty quantities of blackberry and blackcurrant with a little lemon. All the gloopberry sillyjam fun without the lactose – so it’s vegan friendly!
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: THE BAR-BEER-QUE Pack
items.desc:
THE BAR-BEER-QUE 12 x 440ml Pack
This mixed case contains a selection of sunnytime classics to suit all tastes (and go with whatever is on the grill). Beers included:
3 x FLIPSIDE – DDH PALE ALE (NELSON AMARILLO CITRA) – 5.2% ABV
Flipside is a DDH Pale Ale hopped with Nelson, Amarillo and Citra. Tangy white grape notes offset the sharp citrus and sweet peach flavours in this extra pale, extra balanced, hazy crusher.
3 x PARK VIEW – SUMMER WITBIER (MANDARINA BAVARIA) – 4.5% ABV
Park View, a super-quenching Summer Wit hopped with Mandarina Bavaria. Delicate notes of clementine and lemon in this ultra-pale, spritzy and aromatic Witbier are perfectly paired with sitting on a blanket.
3 x FAMOUS BLUE CAGOULE – PALE ALE (NELSON CITRA) – 4.0% ABV
Famous Blue Cagoule is our highly practical Pale Ale for uncertain times and unpredictable weather. Citra and Nelson zip across the palate with those upbeat notes of grape and mango, and keep the finish nice and dry.
3 x BARLEYPOP – LITE LAGER – 4.4% ABV
POP-POP! Barleypop is our new 4.4% Lite Lager. Putting some polish on the well-worn everyday light lager, this is an extremely sunny beer designed for drinking with grass between your toes.

items.name: THE BIG JUICE Pack
items.desc:
THE BIG JUICE 12 x 440ml Pack
This mixed case contains our biggest, juiciest DIPAs, NEIPAs and DDH Pales, collected for your convenience in a 12 can pack. Beers included:
3 x VELVET SPOTLIGHT – DIPA (SABRO CRYO CITRA CRYO SIMCOE) – 8.2% ABV
Velvet Spotlight is our latest DIPA, packing in spectacular Sabro, Cryo Citra and Cryo Simcoe. Big, sticky mango and pineapple vibes take centre stage, softened with a little coconut and lime.
3 x ON THE COUCH – NEIPA (VIC SECRET CRYO MOSAIC CITRA) – 7.3% ABV
On The Couch is our latest sofa-soft, hazy NEIPA. Vic Secret, Cryo Mosaic and Citra hops give this full-bodied and well-cushioned IPA a palate stuffed with sticky stonefruit and citrus.
3 x HOUSE IPA – INDIA PALE ALE (MOSAIC MOTUEKA) – 6.9% ABV
House IPA is a New England IPA with a light and fluffy body, delicate carbonation, and a big-hitting dry-hop combo of Mosaic and Motueka. Aromas of mango and pineapple. More tropical fruit on the tongue. Super drinkable and very moreish.
3 x SECRET HOTEL – DDH PALE ALE (CITRA ENIGMA SABRO) – 5.5% ABV
Secret Hotel is a DDH Rye Pale Ale hopped with Cryo Citra, Enigma and Sabro. Super-pale, hazy and complex, with notes of berries, pineapple and coconut from the hops mingling with a sweet note of spice from the rye malt.

items.name: THE SUPERIOR. LIQUID. GOODNESS. PACK
items.desc:
PRE-ORDER: THE SUPERIOR. LIQUID. GOODNESS. 16 x 440ml Pack
A new, ultra-black-diamond-platinum selection of the best-of-the-best! We pick 16 cans of the absolute -tastiest- beers we’ve recently brewed (selection and quantities TBC) and ship them to you with some super-premium tasting notes and all our love. If this proves popular we’ll turn this into a subscription!
Shipping week commencing 12th October. More info soon!

items.name: THE TOP TWELVE Pack
items.desc:
THE TOP TWELVE 12 x 440ml Pack
Packed with new beers straight off the canning line, along with all of our latest and greatest. Each case of 12 cans will consist of 12 different beers. Cases cannot be customised. Beers included:
VELVET SPOTLIGHT – DIPA (SABRO CRYO CITRA CRYO SIMCOE) – 8.2% ABV
Velvet Spotlight is our latest DIPA, packing in spectacular Sabro, Cryo Citra and Cryo Simcoe. Big, sticky mango and pineapple vibes take centre stage, softened with a little coconut and lime.
MEANWHILE UPTOWN – NEIPA (CRYO AZACCA CRYO CITRA STRATA) – 6.7% ABV
Our first beer with Strata, plus Cryo Azacca and Cryo Citra. A high class NEIPA packing superlative tropical fruit flavours and a luxury-style texture.
ON THE COUCH – NEIPA (VIC SECRET CRYO MOSAIC CITRA) – 7.3% ABV
On The Couch is our latest sofa-soft, hazy NEIPA. Vic Secret, Cryo Mosaic and Citra hops give this full-bodied and well-cushioned IPA a palate stuffed with sticky stonefruit and citrus.
HOUSE IPA – INDIA PALE ALE (MOSAIC MOTUEKA AMARILLO) – 6.9% ABV
House IPA is a New England IPA with a light and fluffy body, delicate carbonation, and a big-hitting dry-hop combo of Mosaic and Motueka. Aromas of mango and pineapple. More tropical fruit on the tongue. Super drinkable and very moreish.
FLIPSIDE – DDH PALE ALE (NELSON AMARILLO CITRA) – 5.2% ABV
Flipside is a DDH Pale Ale hopped with Nelson, Amarillo and Citra. Tangy white grape notes offset the sharp citrus and sweet peach flavours in this extra pale, extra balanced, hazy crusher.
DESERT PARY – DDH PALE ALE (SIMCOE CASCADE AMARILLO) – 4.8% ABV
Desert Pary is a delicious new DDH Pale Ale with the tingly citrus hop combo of Simcoe, Cascade and Amarillo. Got quite a bouncy mouthfeel, rolls around all juicy and piney then puts the brakes on for a pithy finish.
BLANKETS – PALE ALE (CITRA COLUMBUS CASCADE) – 4.2% ABV
Blankets is the newest soft and fluffy creation from the Pale Ale department. Citra, Columbus and Cascade in sheer suppable balance. Pure, silky comfort.
PARK VIEW – SUMMER WIT (MANDARINA BAVARIA) – 4.5% ABV
Park View, a super-quenching Summer Wit hopped with Mandarina Bavaria. Delicate notes of clementine and lemon in this ultra-pale, spritzy and aromatic Witbier are perfectly paired with sitting on a blanket.
TROPICAL DELUXE – PALE ALE (CITRA SIMCOE MOSAIC) – 3.8% ABV
Tropical Deluxe is our core pale ale. Citra, Mosaic and Simcoe do the tropical dry hop tango, while the mighty London Ale III yeast strain keeps things soft, light, and as level as a hammock. Lower in alcohol, deluxer in tropical.
TWILIGHT TRANSISTOR – TABLE BEER (SABRO CHINOOK EL DORADO) – 3.0% ABV
Twilight Transistor is a new, light and bouncy Table Beer, using Sabro, Chinook and El Dorado for a full-spectrum juicy hop character at just 3.0% ABV, with an all-day-long drinkability. It’s a summer blockbuster!
PASSIONFRUIT GOSE – FRUIT SOUR – 4.5% ABV
Tangy, tropical, tart and tasty. A light and snappy Gose-style sour beer, infused with passionfruit.
BASS STRAIT – NEW WORLD HELLES LAGER (MOTUEKA) – 4.7% ABV
Bass Strait is a New World Helles Lager, where the addition of Motueka hops from New Zealand add a gentle, floral fruitiness to the classically bready Helles texture and crisp finish.

items.name: Top Buzzer
items.desc:
Top Buzzer / DDH Pale Ale / 4 x 440ml / 5.6% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Top Buzzer is penthouse-level juice. Simcoe and Strata in peak physical condition with that DDH smoothment. Popping with pineapple and peach at the push of a button.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Velvet Spotlight
items.desc:
Velvet Spotlight / DIPA / 4 x 440ml / 8.2% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Velvet Spotlight is our latest DIPA, packing in spectacular Sabro, Cryo Citra and Cryo Simcoe. Big, sticky mango and pineapple vibes take centre stage, softened with a little coconut and lime.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!
